mapper.sql: so_id, drug_id, payment_number, payment_name, payment_time, establish_time, payment_linkman, payment_phone, payment_state, present_time, present_remarks, gmt_create, gmt_modified, del_id
mapper.select:
SELECT so_id,drug_id,payment_number,payment_name,hospital_number,hospital_name,payment_linkman,payment_phone,payment_state FROM payment pa LEFT JOIN hospital ho on pa.drug_id=ho.hp_id
and pa.payment_number like CONCAT("%",#{paymentNumber},"%")
and pa.payment_name like CONCAT("%",#{paymentName},"%")
and ho.hospital_number like CONCAT("%",#{hospitalNumber},"%")
and ho.hospital_name like CONCAT("%",#{hospitalName},"%")
and pa.payment_linkman like CONCAT("%",#{paymentLinkman},"%")
and pa.payment_phone like CONCAT("%",#{paymentPhone},"%")
and pa.del_id=0

SELECT so_id,drug_id,payment_number,payment_name,hospital_number,hospital_name,payment_linkman,payment_phone ,establish_time,payment_time,payment_state,present_time FROM payment pa LEFT JOIN hospital ho on pa.drug_id=ho.hp_id
so_id=#{soId} and pa.del_id=0

mapper.update:
update payment
drug_id = #{drugId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payment_number = #{paymentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payment_name = #{paymentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payment_time = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where so_id = #{soId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update payment set drug_id = #{drugId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payment_number = #{paymentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_name = #{paymentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_time = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, establish_time = #{establishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, payment_linkman = #{paymentLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_phone = #{paymentPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_state = #{paymentState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, present_time = #{presentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, present_remarks = #{presentRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_id = #{delId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where so_id = #{soId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
